title: Rocked to the Core
description: Why does doing the right thing feel so wrong?Liss is trying to chase her dreams on her own terms, but memories of Joe, her rock star ex, haunt her day and night. She fights for happiness and discovers a life she can call her own.How do you move on when your heart belongs to someone else?But when Joe and his band come back to town and back into her life, his presence reignites her passion for him and threatens to topple the delicate balance of her new existence.Love is a fire that can nurture or destroy, but you can't tell which until you surrender to the flames.
author: Clara Bayard
